kDesc
What the Bleep Peep is bad to the Bone! This naughty little Peep will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
What the Bleep Peep est profondément mauvais! Ce vilain petit Peep va te suivre partout et va être ton meilleur pote.[#Legal]
What the Bleep Peep ist ein ungezogener Begleiter! Dieses freche kleine Peep wird dir zu Hause überall hin folgen und ist dein bester Freund. [#Legal]
What the Bleep Peep é cattivissimo! Questo piccolo Peep tepistello ti seguirá in casa e diventerá il tuo migliore amico.[#Legal]
What the Bleep Peep es bien rudo! Este Peep malportado te seguirá a tu Casa y será tu mejor cuate.[#Legal]
*Not Localised* Home_Object_85 [#Legal]
What the Bleep Peep은 심술궂은 친구랍니다! 이 건방지고 작은 Peep은 집안을 졸졸 따라다니며 당신의 가장 친한 친구가 되고 싶어합니다.[#Legal]
What the Bleep Peep is bad to the Bone! This naughty little Peep will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
What the Bleep Peep壞透了！這頑皮的 Peep會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
